name: react-intl
description: Internationalize React apps. This library provides React components and an API to format dates, numbers, and strings, including pluralization and handling translations.
author: Eric Ferraiuolo <edf@ericf.me>

scripts.clean: rimraf src/en.js coverage/ dist/ lib/ locale-data/ test/renderer.js
scripts.build:dist: npm run build:dist:dev && npm run build:dist:prod
scripts.build: npm run build:data && npm run build:lib && npm run build:dist
scripts.react:14: npm run react:clean && npm i react@^0.14 react-dom@^0.14 react-addons-test-utils@^0.14
scripts.react:15: npm run react:clean && npm i react@^15 react-dom@^15
scripts.test:react: npm run react:14 && jest && npm run react:15 && jest
scripts.test:all: npm run lint && npm run test && npm run test:react
scripts.examples:link: npm link && babel-node scripts/examples npm link react-intl
scripts.preversion: npm run clean && npm run build && npm run test:all
scripts.prepare: npm run clean && npm run build
